title: [Medicine] The coronavirus may cause brain damage, even in patients with mild cases, a new study found

[Medicine] SARS-CoV-2, the virus that causes COVID-19, can remain infective in aerosol for up to 16 hours according to a new study published in Emerging Infectious Diseases. The researchers also found that the virus can survive in the air much longer than other similar coronaviruses, such as SARS or MERS.
